# Expected highest dice
Roll $N$ dice simultaneously. Your score is the highest individual dice result. What is the expected value of your score?

## Formula
This can be calculated as:

$$\frac{1}{6^N}\sum_{i=1}^6 i(i^N-(i-1)^N)$$
